existing_features.title: Update the team setup UI to support configuring the number of teams from 2 to 20 (inclusive), including the displayed label text and all numeric input validation/clamping logic so users cannot set fewer than 2 or more than 20 teams.

new_feature_requests.summary: Support configuring the number of teams to be between 2 and 20
